InstalledItem.Name: Hydrocel
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Industrial

Keep your ship working harder for longer with the durable Hydrocel, an entry-level industrial cooler from respected manufacturer Juno Starwerk.

InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler

Size: 1
Grade: D

InstalledItem.Name: Roughneck
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Industrial

For its class, the Roughneck power plant from Juno Starwerk is an ideal component for haulers looking for maximum performance.

InstalledItem.Name: Cloak
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Ascension Astro
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Stealth

Discreet security is within your reach thanks to this small shield generator from Ascension Astro. With a lower signature then many other generators in its class, the Cloak provides protection without drawing unnecessary attention.

InstalledItem.Name: Ecouter
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Space is vast and unknowable, that’s why discerning pilots rely on the Ecouter small radar from GNP to keep them in the know about what’s around them.

InstalledItem.Name: Mirai Fury 1xS2 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Mirai
Size: 2
Missiles: 1xS2

To make the Fury a threat despite its small size, Mirai developed this bespoke missile rack, which can carry and deploy one S2 missile without undermining the ship's compact profile.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Ignite is Firestorm's premier brand of heat-seeking strike missile that is the definition of Fire and Forget. Simply let it fly and enjoy the show.

InstalledItem.Name: Marksman I Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 1

Behring's Marksman series of proximity missiles has earned as much of a reputation for its ability to track a wide range of heat signatures as it has for its area-effect proximity damage.
